review: Such a wonderful Amazon item! (Wish I had bought when on sale though lol) And so, so very easy to set up and use! My 87 year old grandmother has no problems working the remote. I plan on buying another for my daughter and her husband who live 3 hours away. She is added to my list of family on my Prime and they have WiFi, which I tested using mine at their house and works great (when it's on, still connects to my account). What a wonderful item!!!
